function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Insufficient adaptation of public places for pandemic outbreaks","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and public health crisis","Mitigation":"Implementing adaptive measures to enhance public place safety and health protocols","Technologies":"Smart sensors, contactless technology, air purification systems","People":"Public place visitors, city residents, society at large","Owner":"Public health authorities, local governments, city planners"},{"Description":"Underestimation of the importance of public places in pandemic management","Impact":"Underutilization of valuable resources for disease containment and community support","Mitigation":"Raising awareness of the role of public places and promoting their adaptive use","Technologies":"Informational signage, public awareness campaigns, community engagement platforms","People":"City residents, community leaders, public health officials","Owner":"Local governments, community organizations, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Resistance to adaptive measures due to privacy concerns","Impact":"Limited ability to implement effective disease containment strategies in public places","Mitigation":"Balancing privacy concerns with public health needs, and providing transparent communication about data usage","Technologies":"Privacy-enhancing technologies, data anonymization tools, transparent data governance practices","People":"Public place visitors, privacy advocates, public health officials","Owner":"City planners, public health authorities, technology developers"}]}
